Package com.cz2006.group3.bean

Class DBConnector

java.lang.Object
com.cz2006.group3.bean.DBConnector
public class DBConnector extends Object
(Singleton)DBConnector manages the connection between the server and database. It provides basic methods to retrieve information from/modify information stored in the database.

  • Method Details

    • queryEmail

      public static boolean queryEmail​(String email) throws SQLException
      Performs a selection search according to the input email. This method is used for checking if an email has been registered before. Avoid duplicated user registration.
      Parameters:
      email - a user's email.
      Returns:
      true if the user already exist.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • queryUser

      public static UserData queryUser​(String email) throws SQLException
      Performs a search of user in the database and retrieve it. This method is used for checking the correctness of user password during logging in stage.
      Parameters:
      email - a user's email.
      Returns:
      a UserData object.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • CreateUser

      public static int CreateUser​(String email, String password) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new user in the database with the provided email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's valid email.
      password - the user's password.
      Returns:
      uid the user's unique identifier stored in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateUser

      public static void updateUser​(int uid, String username) throws SQLException
      Modifies the user according to the given uid with new username
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier
      username - the new username to be updated.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateUser

      public static void updateUser​(int uid, int phoneno) throws SQLException
      Modifiers the user according to the given uid with new phone number
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier
      phoneno - the new phone number to be updated.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • DeleteUser

      public static void DeleteUser​(int uid) throws SQLException
      Remove the user entirely from the database.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getReceiptsDefault

      public static ArrayList<ReceiptData> getReceiptsDefault​(int uid) throws SQLException
      Default methods that retrieves the most recent 20 receipts from the database.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier.
      Returns:
      a list of requested receipts
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getReceipts

      public static ArrayList<ReceiptData> getReceipts​(int uid, SearchFilter criteria) throws SQLException
      Retrieves receipts according to a given search criteria.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier.
      criteria - the search requirements.
      Returns:
      a list receipts that fulfills the given requirements.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • putReceipts

      public static void putReceipts​(int uid, org.json.JSONArray receipts) throws SQLException
      Inserts new receipts into the database. This method is used for backing up user's local data to thge.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier.
      receipts - An array of receipts for backing up.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deleteReceipt

      public static void deleteReceipt​(int uid, int rindex) throws SQLException
      Removes a specific receipt from the database according to a given receipt identifier.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier.
      rindex - a receipt's unique identifier.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getMerchantsDefault

      public static ArrayList<MerchantData> getMerchantsDefault​(int uid) throws SQLException
      Retrieves top merchant from database arranged according to datetime.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier.
      Returns:
      a list of merchants.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getMerchants

      public static ArrayList<MerchantData> getMerchants​(int uid, String merchant) throws SQLException
      Retrieves requested merchant from database arranged according to datetime.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier
      merchant - the merchant name
      Returns:
      A list of requested merchants
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getReport

      public static ReportData getReport​(int uid, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a report from the database for the given time period.
      Parameters:
      uid - The user's unique identifier.
      start - The starting datetime to count for the report.
      end - The ending datetime to count for the report.
      Returns:
      A report object
      Throws:
      SQLException
